snippet: Ferrari plans to list its stock on the New York Stock Exchange and will market 17.2 million shares for $48 to $52 apiece, according to an amended filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
abstract: Fiat Chrysler plans to spin off Ferrari at initial public offering valuation of about $9.4 billion, with shares between $48 to $52 each.
lead_paragraph: Ferrari plans to list its stock on the New York Stock Exchange and will market 17.2 million shares for $48 to $52 apiece, according to an amended filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler to Move Forward With Ferrari I.P.O.
headline.print_headline: Fiat Chrysler Moves Forward With Plans for Ferrari I.P.O.
